name: kener
description: Kener is a simple uptime and endpoint monitoring service. It sends requests to configured URLs, records response status and times, and shows checks in a minimal dashboard suitable for monitoring small fleets of services.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Clean, minimal interface showing service status at a glance. Quick overview of infrastructure health

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Automatic downtime detection with historical incident logs. Track outage patterns over time

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Monitor and graph response times for performance analysis. Identify slow services quickly

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Get notified of downtime via email, webhooks, or integrations. Stay informed about outages

features.title: Public Status Page
features.description: Share service status with users through public page. Communicate availability transparently
